wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Edward Bowen (17 November 1903 – 4 March 1981) was an English footballer in the early years of professional football, who played about 200 games for Aston Villa.

response: Jack English is the club's top goalscorer with 143 goals in competitive matches between 1947 and 1959, having surpassed Teddy Bowen's total of 120. Bowen's record had stood since September 1931, when he overtook the total of 110 goals set by striker William Lockett in 1930.Most goals in a career  ntfc.co.uk. Retrieved 2010-01-19.
